Class QueryFormTag

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.SimpleTagSupport
      com.verilion.display.jsp.tags.QueryFormTag
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.JspTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.SimpleTag
public class QueryFormTag
extends javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.SimpleTagSupport

Displays form to perform query against some table(s) or views in the database. Also handles submit of form, and result table

tsawler
